text: Tajikistan national under-17 football team is controlled by the Tajikistan National Football Federation. They have appeared at the FIFA U-17 World Cup twice in 2007 and 2019. Their best result was in 2007 where they finished in the Round of 16. ==FIFA U-17 World Cup record== FIFA U-17 World Cup FIFA U-17 World Cup FIFA U-17 World Cup FIFA U-17 World Cup FIFA U-17 World Cup
